# Daybreak AI

**Type:** Active Project  
**Status:** âœ… **STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIP** - Long-term commitment confirmed!  
**Client:** [[Jeff Mehl]] - Daybreak Virtual Staffing  
**Revenue:** $1000/month (committed long-term)  
**Timeline:** Rollout committed for this week

## Project Overview

**Purpose:** AI chat simulation for customer service interactions  
**Goal:** Improve AI quality for customer service training  
**Technology:** AI transcription, chat simulation, quality scoring  

## Recent Breakthrough (September 2025)

### **PBX Recordings Access**
- **Jeff provided:** Real call recordings via pCloud
- **Link:** https://u.pcloud.link/publink/show?code=kZNLV15ZRCRz8WrGgHf2zdaoJqxXhBaAzicy
- **HIPAA compliant:** Medical recordings edited for PII
- **Volume:** Extensive library available

### **Transcriber System Built**
- **Features:** Upload audio files, transcribe to text, identify speakers
- **Location:** Admin site transcriber page
- **Capability:** Real-time call processing potential

### **Game-Changing Features Outlined**
- **Quality Scoring:** AI compares calls against client instructions
- **Training Data:** Real conversations vs. simulated data
- **Auto-Summaries:** AI-generated call summaries
- **Real-Time Processing:** Immediate transcription after calls

### **Key Questions for Jeff**
- More recordings access - ongoing batches or direct access?
- Audio availability timing - how soon after calls?

- **Payment commitment** - Rejected payment pause, wants to keep paying

- AI Voice competition requires nimble response
